item.title: Israeli media cite official accepting Hamas figure of 70,000 war dead
item.description: Israel has previously cast doubt on figures from the Hamas-run health ministry, which the UN considers reliable.

item.title: Syria's defiant Kurds vow to 'fight until last breath' despite government push
item.description: The US fought IS with the Kurds for years. Now, Donald Trump is siding with Syria's new leader.

item.title: Trump says Putin will not attack Ukraine cities during cold week
item.description: Russia has not confirmed it agreed to Trump's request, but Ukraine's president said he expected Vladimir Putin's promise to be kept.

item.title: Agents in Minneapolis could be pulled back if local officials cooperate, border tsar says
item.description: Tom Homan said the immigration operation would be more "targeted", as the Trump administration works to calm frustrations both in the city and on Capi...

item.title: Chips, anyone? German farm gives away millions of potatoes after bumper harvest
item.description: Dubbed "the great potato rescue", it is part of a plan to save the spuds from going to waste.
